algorithm_technique: Breadth-First Search (BFS) or iterative simulation using a queue.
problem_summary_simple: Collect candies from open boxes, using keys and found boxes to open more.
problem_summary_technical: Simulate box opening using a queue, processing open boxes, collecting candies, and adding new keys/boxes to the queue.
key_insights: This problem can be modeled as a graph traversal where boxes are nodes and keys/contained boxes represent edges.
A BFS-like approach is suitable to explore reachable boxes and collect candies.
The `status` array needs to be updated dynamically as keys are found.
